#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int tc;
scanf("%d",&tc);
for(int i=0;i<tc;i++)
{
int cap,m,w,c;
scanf("%d",&cap);
scanf("%d",&m);
scanf("%d",&w);
scanf("%d",&c);
if(m+w+c<cap)
cap=m+w+c;

int cr=(0.8)*cap;
//cout<<cr<<c<<cap<<endl;
double crd=((0.8*cap)+1)/4;
if(cr>c)
cr=c;
if(4*(m+w)<cr)
cr=4*(m+w);
else if(cap-cr-1==ceil(crd) && cr==(0.8)*cap)
cr++;

int adr=cap-cr;
int wr=(2*adr)/3;
double wrd=(((2*(cap-(0.8*cap)))/3)+1)/2;
//cout<<wrd<<endl;
if(wr>w)
wr=w;
if(2*m<wr)
wr=2*m;
else if(adr-wr-1==ceil(wrd) && wr==(2*adr)/3)
wr++;

int mr=adr-wr;
if(mr>m)
mr=m;

if(mr<=m && wr<=w && cr<=c && wr<=2*mr && cr<=4*(mr+wr))
printf("%d %d %d\n",mr,wr,cr);
//cout<<mr<<" "<<wr<<" "<<cr<<endl;
else
{

if(cap>(c+w+m))
cap=c+w+m;
int mr=0,cr=0,wr=0;

while(1)
{
if((mr+wr+cr)==cap)
break;
if(4*(mr+wr)>cr)
{
if(cr!=c)
cr++;
else
{
if(2*mr>wr)
{
if(wr!=w)
wr++;
else
{
if(mr!=m)
mr++;
else
{
break;
}
}
}
else
if(mr!=m)
mr++;
else
{
break;
}
}
}
else 
{
if(2*mr>wr)
{
if(wr!=w)
wr++;
else
{
if(mr!=m)
mr++;
else
{
break;
}
}
}
else
if(mr!=m)
mr++;
else
{
break;
}
}

}
printf("%d %d %d\n",mr,wr,cr);
//cout<<mr<<" "<<wr<<" "<<cr<<endl;
}

}
return 0;
}
